nodes.text: Shaak and cheese sandwich was a type of sandwich served at Dex's Diner on the planets of Coruscant and Fondor. It consisted of tender slices of shaak meat, melted Byss cheese and topato, served on toasted or thermo-zapped pseudograin bread and costing 6.7 credits. Dexter Jettster picked up the recipe while working as a street advertiser for a restaurant serving the dish in the starship yards of Fondor.
